###### Built for Construction Suppliers
# Accounts Receivable Solutions for Construction Suppliers
With all the day to day challenges, getting paid quickly should not be one of them. Dill helps construction suppliers automate accounts receivable, payments, and lien rights management.
###### [Get a Demo](https://usedill.com/<./demo>)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/LCJIMZ7tIIvGwlNp1n30cyFX8Rg.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/LCJIMZ7tIIvGwlNp1n30cyFX8Rg.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/LCJIMZ7tIIvGwlNp1n30cyFX8Rg.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/LCJIMZ7tIIvGwlNp1n30cyFX8Rg.png)
### 7 days
Faster in payments with Dill
12 hr
Saved per month on manual AR work
Trusted by suppliers and contractors across the country

###### Testimonials
## Suppliers & contractors love us
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/0uCAuQKOzMsnLzevuNJfxXLdAnk.png)
### "Processing each waiver used to take me 5 minutes. With Dill, it takes me 2 minutes. I don’t have to scan anything. All I have to do is just sign. It’s pretty efficient."
###### Robert F.,
Senior Accounting Administrator at Norman S. Wright
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/i1RZIeGmDsyx3kcJim7xS538Y.png)
### "It’s self-explanatory and straight to the point. Benefit for us has been the reminders. We get flooded with a lot of things to do. The reminders are my favorite."
###### Giorgio K.,
District Credit Manager at Consolidated Electrical Distributors
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/SHE4ALa50pzJ6C9ZBc7Y0VADqhM.png)
### "The Dill past due reminders have helped tremendously. I’m able to gear towards people really behind. And for a lot of customers that get these reminders, I’ve gotten responses back 1-2 days after. They say ‘oh it just slipped my mind, I forgot.’ So this is helping to get payments faster."
###### Alicia Ontiveros,
Accounting Manager at Gorman Industries(Blue Hawk member)
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/e7zFoo2u7pPLT07p7WlwWPQNw.png)
### "It’s quick to sign documents. It’s 3x faster than other portals out there. A lot less steps involved. All done in one website."
###### Aaron B., 
Account Representative at Sunstate Equipment
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/NyK8p3luYv8HFqKii1rJ0ueCg.png)
### "Dill has been the missing piece for us, given we’ve been slower to adopt technology. Compared to the other distributors our customers have used in the area, this is the best portal they’ve seen."
###### Devin Moore,
Accounting Manager at Great Western Supply (Affiliated Distributors member)
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/pRrAtVjhpBxnNDZZNp5R9HRGbM8.png)
### "I request a lien waiver through Dill, and it's instantaneous. Before I know it, it's been signed. Vendors have told me that they love the fast and easy signing experience."
###### Jasmine G., 
Accounts Receivable at Silicon Valley Mechanical
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ypTdeF7d28hlJI5SJwJ2ni1tSgU.png)
### "It’s instant. It takes 2 seconds. You just click on it, and it takes you right away to the lien waiver."
###### Silvia G., 
Accounts Receivable at Lord & Sons
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/FzeqX4MTVM1gNBm3rghJDGurVTs.png)
### "It’s terrible if a check goes from Delaware to Maryland—it’s a week. Sometimes 10 days. Less than 100 miles. Now with Dill, we don’t have to wait."
###### Kris Leffew,
Vice President at Applied Equipment Solutions(Blue Hawk member)
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/H9ADzmGqmRsmNkkqdpLyKBCmH8.png)
### "We get paid faster not because we’re nagging people, but because all the information is there on Dill."
###### Derek Burke,
Vice President at Capital Flow(The Commonwealth Group member)
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/rgIg527QIX41rrHMVFB2wOBJtxg.png)
### "I appreciate Dill going above and beyond what was asked of them to help streamline multiple parts of our business."
###### Zac Hays,
Office Manager at Tru-Duct

###### Features
## Accounts Receivable Solutions that get you paid 7 days faster
### Payment Portal & AR Automation
###### Get paid faster, save time, and provide a better customer experience.
### White-labeled invoice & payment portal
Set yourself apart through a better customer experience — a payment portal branded with your logo. Contractors can view invoices by job or PO and select to pay by ACH or credit card, even if it’s outside business hours.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/9onjMHKtblN69K6kOwQpTOBLyk8.png?scale-down-to=512)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/9onjMHKtblN69K6kOwQpTOBLyk8.png?scale-down-to=512)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/9onjMHKtblN69K6kOwQpTOBLyk8.png?scale-down-to=512)
### Automated Statements & Payment Reminders
Automate statements and payment reminders, saving you time and getting you paid faster.
### Auto-Reconciliation
#### Auto-Reconciliation
Automate cash application against your ERP system, reducing manual work and room for error.
### Lien Rights Management
###### Stay on top of your lien rights, get paid, and save time.
### Automated Lien Deadline Tracking
#### Automated Lien Deadline Tracking
Automatically track and get notified on preliminary notice and lien deadlines, with invoice data pulled from your ERP system.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ZvqKac8KyI027raYrTKwXNVtoM.png?scale-down-to=1024)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ZvqKac8KyI027raYrTKwXNVtoM.png?scale-down-to=1024)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ZvqKac8KyI027raYrTKwXNVtoM.png?scale-down-to=1024)
### Automated Job Verification
#### Automated Job Verification
Automatically verify job information like owner and GC to save time and ensure accuracy.
### 1-Click Lien Waiver Signature
#### 1-Click Lien Waiver Signature
Reduce time spent processing lien waivers by 5x, and keep all waivers in one place.

###### Features
## Accounts Receivable Solutions that get you paid 7 days faster
### Payment Portal & AR Automation
###### Get paid faster, save time, and provide a better customer experience.
### White-labeled invoice & payment portal
Set yourself apart through a better customer experience — a payment portal branded with your logo. Contractors can view invoices by job or PO and select to pay by ACH or credit card, even if it’s outside business hours.

### Auto-Reconciliation

### Lien Rights Management

### Company Overview: Dill

**Name:** Dill  
**Website:** [usedill.com](https://usedill.com/)  
**Founded:** 2022  
**Part of:** Y Combinator Batch W23  

Dill is all about transforming the payment processes for the construction industry. It’s a digital payments and workflow automation platform designed specifically for contractors and construction suppliers. The mission here is straightforward: making the typically cumbersome accounts receivable process smoother and faster. For those in the construction world, getting paid promptly can be a real challenge. Dill tackles this head-on with a suite of features aimed at automating payments and lien rights management.

### What Dill Does

Dill's offerings center around improving cash flow and efficiency. With features such as:

- **Automated Payments and Invoicing:** Contractors can process payments outside of business hours—ideal for busy schedules.
- **Lien Rights Management:** Dill helps you stay on top of your lien deadlines, ensuring you don't miss crucial dates.
- **1-Click Lien Waiver Signatures:** This drastically reduces the time needed to handle lien waivers—more efficiency means fewer headaches.

### Testimonials

Dill has made waves in the industry, with testimonials from users like Robert F., who notes that processing a waiver has gone from 5 minutes to just 2 with Dill. Giorgio K. praises the intuitive design, especially the reminders that cut through the noise of daily tasks. 

Both contractors and suppliers have endorsed Dill as a game-changer, emphasizing how it streamlines operations and speeds up payments without the ongoing hassle of constant follow-ups.

### Integration and Automation

Dill prides itself on being compatible with major accounting systems, pulling invoicing data seamlessly into the platform. This auto-reconciliation feature significantly diminishes manual labor, freeing up teams to focus on more strategic tasks rather than getting bogged down in paperwork.

### Conclusion

Dill is redefining the standards for payment processes in the construction industry. By simplifying accounts receivable and providing a sharper focus on technology integration, Dill not only helps users get paid faster but also enhances their overall efficiency. It’s a tool designed for a fundamental challenge in construction—because in this field, speed can mean everything. 

If you're interested in elevating your payment process, [get a demo](https://usedill.com/<./demo>) to see how Dill can work for you.
